headline: Quanta Services, Inc. (PWR) Can Benefit From US Manufacturing Reshoring, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Warned About Samsung’s Phones. Quanta Services, Inc. (NYSE:PWR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Quanta Services, Inc. (NYSE:PWR)’s shares have gained 22% year-to-date to make them the best-performing stock among its mega construction and engineering services peers. Quanta Services, Inc.
